ca.uqac.lif.ecp.statechart

Class Transition<T extends Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.ecp.statechart.Transition<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the event on the transition
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomicTransition, TrashTransition

    public abstract class Transition<T extends Event>
extends java.lang.Object
    A transition from a state to another in a statechart
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

      • m_target

        protected Configuration<T extends Event> m_target
        The target of this transition

      • m_action

        protected Action<T extends Event> m_action
        The action associated to this transition. Actions are optional.

        protected Operator<T extends Event> m_guard
        A Boolean expression

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transition

        public Transition()
        Creates a new empty transition
        Parameters:
        statechart - The statechart this transition belongs to

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        public final boolean matches(T event,
                             Statechart<T> statechart)
        Determines if this transition applies (i.e. fires) on the event given as input
        Parameters:
        event - The event
        statechart - The statechart this transition belongs to
        Returns:
        true if the transition fires, false otherwise

      • afterGuard

        protected abstract boolean afterGuard(T event,
                                      Statechart<T> statechart)
        Checks whether a transition fires, after the guard on that transition has been evaluated. This method is only called if the guard on that transition evaluates to true.
        Parameters:
        event - The event
        statechart - The statechart this transition belongs to
        Returns:
        true if the transition fires, false otherwise

      • clone

        public abstract Transition<T> clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

      • getTarget

        public Configuration<T> getTarget()
        Gets the target of this transition
        Returns:
        A configuration

      • hasSameParameters

        protected boolean hasSameParameters(Transition<T> t)
        Checks that this transition has the same parameters (guard, action, target) as another one
        Parameters:
        t - The other transition
        Returns:
        true if the transition has the same parameters, false otherwise

      • setAction

        public Transition<T> setAction(Action<T> action)
        Associates an action to this transition
        Parameters:
        action - An action. May be null; in such a case, deletes any action already associated to the transition.
        Returns:
        This transition

      • setGuard

        public Transition<T> setGuard(Operator<T> guard)
        Associates a guard to this transition
        Parameters:
        action - An guard. May be null; in such a case, deletes any guard already associated to the transition.
        Returns:
        This transition

      • executeAction

        public void executeAction(T event,
                          Statechart<T> statechart)
                   throws ActionException
        Executes the action associated to this transition, if one is defined
        Parameters:
        event - The event that fired this transition
        statechart - The statechart this transition belongs to
        Throws:
        ActionException

      • getGuard

        public Operator<T> getGuard()
        Gets the guard associated to this transition
        Returns:
        The guard, or null if no guard is defined

      • getAction

        public Action<T> getAction()
        Gets the action associated to this transition
        Returns:
        The action, or null if no action is defined
